abstract: The European antitrust chief said that any changes Google offered to settle concerns that it might be tilting Internet search results in its favor should be applied worldwide.
snippet: The European antitrust chief said that any changes Google offered to settle concerns that it might be tilting Internet search results in its favor should be applied worldwide.
lead_paragraph: BRUSSELS — The European antitrust chief said Wednesday that any changes Google offered to settle concerns that it might be tilting Internet search results in its favor should be applied worldwide.

headline.main: Europe Says It May Seek Global Rules for Google
headline.print_headline: Europe Says It May Seek Global Rules For Google
